p: Nucleotide sequences of enterovirus isolates were constructed to contig and were compared with a reference, the Noyce (Accession no. AF083069) strain, which was originally identified in the USA in 1954, and the nucleotide sequence of which was obtained from Genbank databases [ 17]. Sequence analyses were performed using computer software included in the Lasergene package (DNASTAR, Inc., Madison, WI, USA).
